Izingane zigcinwa emakhaya anakekela abantwana ngezizathu eziningi njengokukhishwa inyumbazane, ukuhlukunyezwa kanye nokuphamba.
Kayikho ingane okufanele ikhule endaweni engalungile, engenalo uthando, engenankathalo kanye nemfundo, kodwa kuyenzeka.
Sikholelwa ukuthi Uhlelo Lokutholwa Kwezingane luzoba yindawo yokuphepha yalezi zingane.
Inqubo yethu yokuthola abantwana abangenabazali kumelwe ihlinzeke ngamakhaya aphephile, abanakekeli abanothando, imfundo ezinzile, kanye nezokwelapha ezinokwethenjelwa.
Ikhaya lezintandane kumelwe lihlinzeke ngezidingo ezazingatholakali ekhaya abathathwe kulo ngaphambili.
Abantwana babekwa kuKhathalelo lweNkxaso yabantwana ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukeneyo eziphakathi kokungahoywa, ukuxhatshazwa, kwanokuphanga.
Akukho mtwana omele akhulele endaweni engaphuhlisiyo, engakhathaliyo, futhi enemfundo, kodwa kuyenzeka.
INkqubo yokuKhathalelwa kwabantwana siyibona iyindawo yokhuseleko kwaba bantwana.
Inkqubo yethu yokukhathalela abantwana kufuneka ibonelele ngamakhaya akhuselekileyo, abanonopheli abanothando, imfundo ezinzileyo kunye nokhathalelo lwempilo oluthembekileyo.
Ukhathalelo lokugcina abantwana kufanele ukuba lubonelele ngazo zonke izinto ezazisilela ekhayeni ababethathwe kulo ngaphambili.
Izitibili izinto zokusekela izinyawo zomgibeli ezilenga ezingxenyeni zonke zesihlalo sehhashi.
Zinikeza ukuzinza emgibelini kodwa zingaba nezinkinga zokuphepha ngenxa yamathuba okuba izinyawo zomgibeli zibhajwe kuzo.
Uma umgibeli ewiswa yihashi kodwa unyawo lwakhe lubambeke esitibilini, angahuduleka uma ihhashi libaleka. Ukunciphisa lengozi, izinyathelo ezimbalwa zokuphepha zingathathwa.
Okokuqala, abagibeli abaningi bagqoka amabhuzi okugibela anesithende kanye nesoli ebushelelezi, ecijile.

Okulandelayo, ezinye izihlalo zehhashi, ngokukhethekile izihlalo zamaNgisi, zinezinsimbi zokuphepha ezivumela isikhumba sesitibili ukuba siwe esihlalweni lapho isihlalo sidonswelwa emuva umgibeli owayo.
I Stirrups zizixhasi zomqhubi ezijinga emazantsi enyawo kumacala esadile.
Zimxhasa nangakumbi umkhweli kodwa kungakho inkxalabo ngokhuseleko ngenxa yokuba imilenze yomkhweli ingabambeka kuso.
Ukuba inkweli iyawa kwihashe kuze unyawo lwayo lubambeke kwimikhala,ingarhuqwa ukuba ihashe liyabaleka.Ukunciphisa ubungozi, zininzi izinto emaziqatshelwe kuqala.
Okokuqala, abakhweli abaninzi banxiba iiibhutsi ezinesithende kunye nesoli etsolo nempuluswa.
Okulandelayo, ezinye iSali ingakumbi ezamaNgesi, zinezinto zokhuseleko ezibangela amabhanti esikhumba ukuba aphume kwisale Ukuba atsalelwa ngasemva ngumkhweli owayo.
Ukuhamba ngendiza kungaba isenzakalo esithusayo kubantu beminyaka yonke nezizinda zonke, ikakhulukazi uma bengakahambi ngendiza ngaphambili noma uma behlangabezane nesenzakalo esishaqisayo.
Akuyona into yokuba namahloni ngayo: ayihlukile ezintweni ezisatshwa abantu ngabanye abaningi nalezo abangazithandi.

Kwabanye abantu, ukuzwisisa okuthile kokuthi indiza isebenza kanjani nokuthi kwenzekani phakathi nokundiza kungabasiza ukuthi banqobe ukwesaba okusekelwe ezintweni ezingaziwa noma ukungaphathi izintambo.
Ukuhamba ngenqwelomoya kungaba ngamava oyikekayo ebantwini bonke nongakanani, nemvelaphi, ikakhulu ukuba zange bakhe bandize ngaphambili okanye bakhe bakwisiganeko esothusayo.
Asiyonto omele ube nentloni ngayo; ayahlukanga kuloyiko lobuqu nokungathandii ezinye izinto abantu abaninzi abangazithandiyo.

Kwabanye, ukuqonda into ethile ngendlela inqwelo ntaka esebenza ngayo nokuba kwenzeka ntoni ebudeni bokuhamba ngenqwelo ntaka, kungabanceda boyise uloyiko lwento engaziwayo okanye ukungakwazo ukulawula okwenzekayo.
Ukuphimisela cishe kulula ngesiNtaliyane njengoba amagama amaningi aphinyiselwa ngedlela efanayo nabhalwe ngayo
Izinhlamvu eziyinhloko okumelwe uziqaphele u-c no-g, njengoba ukuziphimisela kuhluka ngokusekelwe kunkamisa olandelayo.
Qiniseka ukuthi ubiza uhlamvu u-r kanye nezinhlamvu u-rr ngokuhlukile: u-caro usho ukuthi othandekayo, kuyilapho u-carro esho inqola.
Ukubiza amagama kulula ngesiTaliyane ekubeni amagama amaninzi ebizwa kanye ngale ndlela abhalwe ngayo
Oonobumba abayintloko ekufuneka bajongwe ngu-c no-g, kuba amagama ukuwabaza kuyahluka ngokuxhomekeka kwizikhamiso ezilandelayo.
Ibe kufuneka uqiniseke ukuba u-r no-rr ubabiza ngokwahlukileyo: u-caro uthetha sithandwa, kanti yena u-carro uthetha inqwelo yamahashe.
Uma uvakashela izindawo zase-Arctic noma e-Aantarctic ebusika ungabona ubusuku obuthatha amahora angaphezu kuka-24, okusho ukuthi ilanga alisi ngaphezu komkhathizwe.
Lokhu kunikeza ithuba elihle lokubona Ukukhanya okunqabile okuye kuvele esibhakabhakeni esiphezulu, njengoba isibhakabhaka sizofiphala cishe usuku lonke.
Njengoba izindawo zingahlali abantu abaningi, nokuphazamisa kokukhanya kungavamanga ukuba inkinga, uzokwazi futhi ukujabulela izinkanyezi.
Ukuba utyelela imimandla ye-Artic okanye ye-Antarctic ebusika uza kufumana ubusuku be-polar, nto leyo ethetha ukuba ilanga aliphumi esibhakabhakeni.
Lena yenza ithuba lokubona i-Aurora borealis, njengokuba isibhakabhaka siyakuba mnyama nje kancinci ekuhambeni kwexesha.
Nanjengoko iindawo zingaxinenanga, nongcoliseko lungeyongxaki kangoko, uya kukwazi nokubona iinkwenkwezi.
IZwe lase-Ellsworth liyindawo eseningizimu neNhlonhlo, likhawuliswe uLwandle iBellingshausen.
Izintaba zeNhlonhlo zihlangana enkangaleni, bese zihlangana futhi ukwakha uchungechunge lweziNtaba sase-Ellsworth, ezinqunywa phakathi yiGilesiya yase-Minnesota.
Ingxenye engasenyakatho noma iSentinel Range inezintaba eziphakeme kunazo zonke zase-Antarctica, iVinson Massif, ephakeme yaba ngu-4892 m iMount Vinson.
I-Ellsworth Land ngummandla ongakumzantsi woSinga-siqithi owahlulwa yi-Bellingshuasen Sea.
Iintaba zoSinga-siqithi zidibana apha nendawo ethe tyaba, emva koko ziphinde zenze iikhilomitha eziyi-360 Zeentaba ezidibeneyo ze-Ellsworth, zisahlulwa yi-Minnesota Glacier.
Inxalenye esemantla ye-Sentinel Range inezona ntaba ziphakamileyo zase-Antarctica, i-Vinson Massif, enencopho eyi-4892 yeemitha eMount Vinson.
Izinto zangaphambi kwenkathi yamanje ngokuvamile azisasetshenziswa namuhla, futhi zihlala kumamyuziyamu, noma izindawo zokufundisa.

Njengoba ukuphazamisa kokukhanya ngesikhathi sokudlondlobala kwazo kwakungeyona inkinga okuyiyona namuhla, ngokuvamile zitholakala emadolobheni noma ezikoleni, zitholakala kalula kunalezo ezakhiwe ngezikhathi zanamuhla.
Izindawo eziningo ezaziwayo zesibonakude ziyizindawo ezingaziwa ezindaweni ezinesimo esithandekayo.
Indawo zemiboniso yakudala azisasetyenziswa unamhlanje, sezihleli njengemyuziyam, okanye iindawo zokufundisa.
Njengoko ukungcoliseka okungephi kokukhanya ngezo ntsuku kwakungeyongxaki efana nale yale mihla, kudla ngokubakho ezixekweni, okanye kwiziza ekulula ukuya kuzo kunezo zakhiwe kumaxesha angoku.
Izixhobo zophanda ezinintsi zalemihla ziluluhlu kwindawo ezisemva kwiimeko ezilungele oko.

Amabhasi asuka esiteshi samabhasi esiphakathi kwesifunda (ngaphesheya komfula) usuku lonke, nakuba amaningi, ikakhulukazi lawo aya ngasempumalanga naseJakar/Bumthang asuka phakathi kuka-06:30 no-07:30.
Njengoba amabhasi esifunda ngokuvamile egcwala, kuyatuseka ukuthi uthenge ithikithi ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ngaphambili.
Izigodi eziningi zikhonzwa amaBhasi we-Coaster waseJapani amancane, anethezekile naqinile.
Amatekisi ahlanganyelwayo ayindlela esheshayo nenethezekile yokuya ezindaweni eziseduze, njengase-Paro (Nu 150) kanye nase-Punakha (Nu 200).
Ibhasi zishiya isitishi I inter -district( ngapha komlambo) imini yonke,nangona unizi, ikakhulu ezo zibheka ngase east nase Jakar/Bumthang zihamba phakathi ko-06:30 no-07:30.
Nanjengoko iibhasi zesisithili zisoloko sigcwele, uyacetyiswa ukuba uthenge itikiti kuselithuba.
Izithili ezininzi zithuthwa zibhasi ezincinci zeJapanese Coaster, ezisemgangathweni zihamba nakakuhle.
Iteksi ozikhwela nabanye abantu yindlela ekhawulezayo nemnandi yokuya kwiindawo ezikufutshane, njengaseParo (Nu150) nasePunakha (Nu 200).
Ukusetshenziswa kohlelo lwevidiyo kuholele kukwazisa okubalulekile ekuchazweni kokuziveza okuncane kakhulu, ukunyakaza kobuso okuthatha imizuzwana.
Ikakhulu, kuthiwa umuntu angabona ukuthi umuntu uqamba amanga ngokuchachisa izibonakaliso zobuso ezincane ngokunembile.
U-Oliver Sack ephepheni lakhe lNkulumo kaMongameli, uphawule ukuthi abantu okunzima ngabo ukuqonda inkulumo ngenxa yokulimala engqondweni bayakwazi ukubona ubuqotho ngokunembile.
Futhi usikisele nokuthi amakhono anjalo wokuchaza indlela yokuziphatha yabantu angahlanganyelwa nezilwane ezinjengezinja ezifuywayo.
Ukusetyenziswa kwe-video nokurekhoda kwenzele ukufunywana okubalulekileyo ekqondeni iimbonakalo ezincinci zokutshintsha kobuso, iintshukumo zobuso ezithatha imizuzwananana embalwa.
Ngokukhethekileyo, kuthiwa umntu angakwazi ukubona ukuba omnye umntu uyaxoka ngokwazi ukutolika kakuhle izinto eziboniswa bubuso bakhe.
U-Oliver Sacks, kwiphepha lakhe i-The President’s Speech, wabonisa ukuba abantu abangakwazi kuqonda intetho ngenxa yomonzakalo engqondweni bayakwazi ukufikelela enyanisweni ngokuchanileyo.
Ude acebise ngelithi indlela yokwazi ukutolika izimbo zomntu isenokubakho nakwizilwanyana ezifana nenja zekhaya.
Izinambuzane kwakuyizilwane zokuqala zokundiza. Ikhono lazo lokundiza lazisiza zigweme izitha kalula ngokwengeziwe futhi zithole ukudla kanye nomana ngokuphumelelayo kakhudlwane.
Izinambuzane eziningi zisizakala ngokukwazi ukugoqa amaphiko wazo emva komzimba wazo.
Lokhu kubanika indawo enkudlwana yezindawo ezincane zokucashela izilwane ezizingelayo.
Namuhla, ukuphela kwezinambuzane ezingakwazi ukugoqa amaphiko wazo izinzekamanzi nosathamanzi.
Izinambuzane yayizizilwanyane zokuqala ukubhabha. Ukukwazi kwazo ukubhabha kuzinceda ziphephe iintshaba lula futhi zifumane ukutya zizalise ngcono.
Uninzi lwezinambuzane zinendlela yokukwazi ukusonga amaphiko azo abe secaleni komzimba.
Oku kuzinika iindawo ezininzi ezincinci zokuzifihla kwezinye izilwanyana.
Kule mihla, izinambuzane ezingakwazi ukusonga amaphiko azo zimpukane neengcongconi.
Ukuhamba kweZimoto ucwaningo lwabashayeli ngabanye nezimoto phakathi kwezindawo ezimbili kanye nokusebenzelana kwazo.
Ngeshwa, ukucwaninga ukuhamba kwezimoto kunzima ngoba imikhuba yabashayeli angeke ibikezelwe ngokuqiniseka okuphelele.
Ngenhlanhla, abashayeli bathambekele ekuziphatheni ngendlela ecishe ifane; ngakho ukuminyana kwezimoto kuthambekele ekufaneni futhi cishe kungafanekiswa ngokwezibalo.
Ukufanisa kangcono ukuhamba kwezimoto, ubudlelwane bumisiwe phakathi kwezici ezintathu eziyinhloko: (1) ukuhamba, (2) ukuminyana, kanye (3) nesivinini.
Lobu budlelwane buyasiza ekuhleleni, ekuklameni, kanye nasekusebenziseni izakhiwo zasemgwaqweni.
Ukuhamba Kwemoto kukufunda ngokuhamba komqhubi ngamnye neemoto ukusuka kwenye indawo ukuya kwenye indawo nendlela abaqhubana ngayo omnye nomnye.
Ngelishwa, ukufunda ukuphokoka komthamo wezithuthi kunzima kuba izimbo zomqhubi azikwazi kuthelekeleka ngokugqibeleleyo.
Ngethamsanqa, abaqhubi badla ngokuziphatha kakuhle phakathi kuluhlu olufanelekileyo; Ke, imijelo yendlela ithambekele ekubeni nokungaguquguquki okufanelekileyo kwaye inokumelwa ngokwezibalo.
Ukuba ngumeli ongcono wokuhamba kwetrafikhi, ubudlelwane busekiwe phakathi kweempawu ezintathu eziphambili: (1) ukuhamba, (2) uxinano, kunye (3) nesantya.
Olu lwalamano lunceda ukucebeni, ukuyileni nasekusebenzeni kweendlela.
Isilingo sika-Hershey no-Chase bekungokunye kokusikisela okuhamba phampili kokuthi iDNA isakhi sofuzo.
U-Hershey noChase basebenzise ama-phages, noma amagciwane, ukuthi bafake i-DNA yabo phakathi kwebhakithiliya.
Benze izivivinyo ezimbili ngokwenza i-DNA nge-phage besebenzisa iphosphorus ye-radioactive noma amaprotheni e-phage nge-sulfur ye-radioactive.
Uvavanyo lweHershey kunye noChase yenye yeengcebiso eziphambili zokuba iDNA yayiyinto yemfuza.
U-Hershey no-Chase basebenzise ii-phages, okanye ii-virus, ukufaka i-DNA yabo kwintsholongwane.
Benza iimvavanyo ezimbini zokumakisha nokuba yi-DNA kwipheji ene-radioactive phosphorus okanye iprotheni ye-phage enesalfure eqhumayo.
Izindawo zokuvakasha ezingokwemvelo zikhanga abantu abathanda ukuvakashela izindawo ezingokwemvelo ngenhloso yokujabulela ukubuka indawo, kuhlanganise izitshalo nezilwane zasendle.
Izibonelo zemisebenzi eyenziwa endaweni zihlanganisa ukuzingela, ukudoba, ukuthatha izithombe, ukubuka izinyoni, kanye nokuvakashela amapaki nokufunda ukwaziswa okumayelana nezinto eziphilayo.
Isibonelo ukuvakasha, ukuthatha izithombe, kanye nokufunda ngama-orangatan eBorneo.
Ukhenketho lwabatyeleli olusekelwe kwindalo lutsala abantu abanomdla wokutyelela ngenjongo yokubuka indalo kuquka izityalo kunye nezilwanyana zasendle.
Imizekelo yokwenzekayo esaythini iquka ukuzingela, ukuloba, ukufota, ukubukela iintaka, ukundwendwela kwiipaki nokufunda ngolwazi lwendalo.
Umzekelo kukundwendwela, ufote kwaye ufunde nge organgatuangs e orneo.
Ubuthi bangaphakathi kungezeka bungabonakali ngokushesha. Izimpawu, njengokuhlanza zanele ngokuvamile kangangokuthi umhlahlo wokushesha angeke wenziwe.
Isibonakaliso esihle kakhulu soshevu ovela ngaphakathi kungaba ukuba khona kwezitsha zemithi ezivulekile noma amakhemikhali wasendlini anobuthi.
Bheka ilebula ukuze ubone iziqondiso soziso lokuqala zalowo shevu.
Ityhefu engaphakathi ingangabonakali msinya. Iimpawu, njengokugabha ziqheleke kangangoba ingayenyinto egulisayo.
Eyona sayini yokuthyefeka kwangaphakathi kukubakho kwe container yeyeza okanye ikhemikhali ezisetyenziswayo ekhayeni ezinobungozi.
Jonga ileyibhile yemiyalelo yoncedo lokuqala malunga netyhefu ethile.
Ukufuya ama-reindeer indlela ebalulekile yokuziphilisa phakathi kwamaSámi futhi isiko elizungeze lomsebenzi libalulekile futhi nakwabanye abaneminye imisebenzi.

Ngisho nangokwesiko, nokho, akuwona wonke amaSámi ayehlanganyele ngokugcwele ekufuyeni izinyamazane, kodwa ayephila ngokudoba, ukuzingela nokufanayo, besebenzisa izinyamazane njengezilwane eziboshelwayo.
Namuhla abaningi abantu bama-Sámi abasebenza kwezohwebo zesimanje. Ezokuvakasha ngumholo obalulekile e-Sápmi, endaweni yama-Sámi.
Ukwalusa iiReindeer yindlela yokuziphilisa ebalulekileyo kumaSámi, ibe isiko elinokuthanani nolu shishino lubalulekile nakwanye abantu abenza eminye imisebenzi.
Nangokwesiko, nangona, hayi onke ama-Sámi anesandla ekuzingelweni kwamahlumela ngamandla, baphile ngokuloba, ukuzingela nokunjalo, benamahlumela njengezilwanyane zomsebenzi.
Kule mihla ama Sámi amaninzi asebenza kushishino lwalwamaxesha. Ukhenketho yeyona ngeniso eSápmi, kwindawo yama Sám.
Ipaki lezwe lePlitvice Lakes ligcwele izihlahla kakhulu, ngokuyinhloko line-beech, i-spruce, kanye nezihlahla ze-fir, futhi inenhlanganisela yezimila zase-Alps kanye naseMedithera.
Inezinhlobo eziningi eziphawulekayo zemiphakathi yezitshalo, ngenxa yokwahluka kwesimo sezilu sayo esikahle, umhlabathi ongafani kanye namazinga okuphakama ahlukile.
Lendawo ibuye ibe yikhaya lezinhlobo ezingi zezilwane kanye nezinyoni.

Izilwane eziyivelakancane ezinjengebhere elinsundu laseYurophu, impisi efana nenketshane, ukhozi, isikhova, indabushe, ikati lasendle kanye ne-capercaillie zingatholakala lapho, kanye nezinye izinhlobo ezivamile.
I-Plitvice Lakes ipaka karhulumente inamahlathi amaninzi, uninzi lwawo yimithi ye-beech, ye-spruce nelohlobo oluthile lompayina
Ineentlobo zezityalo ezahlukahlukeneyo, ngenxa yokulungela kwayo imozulu yeendawo ezincinci, umhlaba owahlukileyo kunye nokwahluka kweendawo eziphakamileyo.
Le ndawo ikwalikhaya kwizilwanyana neentaka ezininzi ezahlukahlukeneyo.
Izilwanyana ezinqabileyo ezifana nebhere laseYurophu elintsundu, iingcuka, ukhozi, isikhova, ingqawa, ikati yasendle kunye ne-lowe zezinye zezidalwa eziqhelekileyo.
Amaqembu abukeka njengangokoqobo aphathwa ngezimiso ezifanayo zobuhle njengamaqembu angokwesiko, kepha kunomehluko ocashile.
Amalungu weqembu wekhompyutha avame ukusebenza njengendawo yokuxhumana yamalungu aseduze kakhulu eqembu elingokoqobo.
Ngokuvamile banenkululeko yokuzimela kakhulu kunamalungu eqembu avamile njengoba amaqembu abo angahlangana ngokuya ngezikhathi zendawo ezihlukene okungenzeka kungaqondwa abaphathi basendaweni.
Ukuba khona “kweqembu elingabonakali” langempela (uLarson noLaFasto, 1989, k109) kubuye kube yisici esikhethekile seqembu ekungelona elingokoqobo.
Iqembu elingabonakali iqembu labaphathi lelo ilungu ngalinye elilandisa kubo. Iqembu elingabonakali libekela ilungu ngalinye izindinganiso.
Amaqela asebenza kwi-Intanetha kufuneka afikelele imilinganiselo ekwizinga elinye nalawo aqhelekileyo, kodwa kukho umahluko omncinci.
Amalungu eqela elifanelekileyo ahlala esebenza njengendawo yokunxibelelana neqela labo lomzimba.
Bahlala benokuzimela ngakumbi kunamalungu eqela eliqhelekileyo njengoko amaqela abo anokuhlangana ngokwamaxesha ahlukeneyo angenakuqondwa ngabaphathi babo basekuhlaleni.
Ubukho beqela "elingabonakaliyo" lokwenyani (uLarson noLaFasto, 1989, p109) ikwayinto eyodwa kwiqela elibonakalayo.
“Iqela elingabonakaliyo” liqela elilawulayo apho amagosa enikezela ingxelo kulo. Iqela elingabnakaliyo libeka izinga legosa ngalinye.
Ukuthenga izimpahla ezingakhokhiswa intela kuyithuba lokuthenga izimpahla ezikhishwe izintela kanye nentela yezimpahla ezindaweni ezithile.
Izihambi eziya emazweni akhokhisa intela ephezulu kwesinye isikhathi zingonga imali eningi, ikakhulukazi emikhiqizweni efana neziphuzo ezidakayo nogwayi.
I-Duty free shopping lithuba lokuthenga izinto kodwa ungabhataliswa itax yaye yenziwa kwezinye indawo.
Abahambi abaya kumazwe abiza irhafu eninzi, banokonga imali eninzi ngamanye amaxesha, ingakumbi kwiimveliso ezifana notywala okanye icuba.
Ukubhukha kusenesikhathi kunikeza isihambi ukuthula kwengqondo kokuthi sizoba nendawo yokulala kuyo lapho sifika endaweni esiya kuyo.
Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo kaningi ziba nezaphulelo namahhotela athile, nakuba ungakwazi ukubhukha ezinye izinhlobo zokuhlala, njengendawo yamakamu, ngenkampani ehlela uhambo.

Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo zinikeza inhlanganisela yezinto ezihlanganisa ibhulakufesi, amalungiselelo wezinto zokuthutha zokuya/zokusuka esikhumulweni sezindiza noma isethi ehlangene yendiza kanye nehhotela.
Bayakwazi ukukugcinela indawo uma wena usadinga isikhathi sokucabanga noma usafisa ukulungisa izinto ezithinta uhambo lwakho (isibonelo i-visa).
Noma iziphi izinguquko noma izicelo nokho kumelwe zidluliselwe enkampanini ehlela uhambo kuqala futhi hhayi nehhotela ngokuqondile.
Ukubhukisha ngaphambi kwexesha kunika abakhweli uxolo lwengqondo lokuba baya kuba nendawo ethile yokulala nje akuba befika kwindawo abaya kuyo.

Abalungiseleli babahambi babanezivumelwano nehotela ezithile, nagona unokufumana kukwazeka ukubhukisha ezinye indlela zendawo zokufikela, njengendawo zokukhempisha, ngokusebenzisa abalungiseleli babahambi.

Iiarhente zokuhamba zihlala zibonelela ngeephakeji eziquka isidlo sakusasa, amalungiselelo okuthuthwa ukuya / ukusuka kwisikhululo seenqwelo-moya okanye uhambo ngepleyini oludityanisiweyo kunye neephakheji zehotele.
Bayakwazi nokukugcinela ibhukisho lwakho xa usadinga ixesha lokucinga ngesipho okanye usazama ezinye incwadi zokundwendwela kwakho ( umzekelo ivisa).
Naluphi utshintsho okanye isicelo simele siqale kumcebi wohambo singasiwa ngqo kwihotele.
Ukubuka ama-cherry eqhakaza, okwaziwa ngokuthi i-hanami, kube ingxenye yesiko laseJapani kusukela ngekhulu lama-8 leminyaka.
Umcabango uvela eShayina lapho izimbali zepulamu kwakuyimbali ethandwayo.
EJapani, imicimbi yokuqala yokuqhakaza kwama-cherry yabungazwa umbusi eyibungazela yena kuphela kanye namanye amalungu ohlobo lobukhosi lwasezweni Esigodlweni saseBukhosini.
Ukudubula kweziqhamo ezibomvu okwaziwa njengehanami, bekusoloko kuyinxalenye yenkcubeko yaseJapan ukususela ngenkulungwane ye-8.
Eli cebo livela eTshayina apho indubulo yeeplamu kwakuyintyantyambo ethandwayo.
EJapan, eyokuqala ipati yecherry blossom yabanjwa ngukumkani esenzela yena kuphela kunye namalungu obuhandibay kwinkundla ze-Imperial.
IFinland indawo ekahle yokuhamba ngesikebhe. "I-Lake of a thousand lakes" ineziqhingi eziyizinkulungwane futhi, emachibini kanye nasemaqoqweni eziqhingi ezingasogwini.
Edlanzaneni leziqhingi nasemachibini awudingi isikebhe.
Yize iziqhingi ezingasogwini kanye namachibi amakhulu kunawo wonke emakhulu ngokwanele ukuthwala noma imuphi umkhumbi kanokusho, izikebhe ezincane noma ngisho ne-kayak inikeza okwenzekayo okuhlukile.
Ukuhamba ngezikebhe indlela yokuzilibazisa yezwe eFinland, ngesikebhe kubantu abayisikhombisa noma abayisishiyagalombili.
Lokhu kufana ne-Norway, i-Sweden kanye neNyuzilandi, kodwa ngaphandle kwalokho kuhlukile ngempela (isib. E-Netherlands isibalo okukodwa kuya kwezingamashumi amane).
iFinland yindawo emnandi yokuqhuba isikhitshane. “Ilizwe lamachweba angamawaka” ekwaneziqithi ezingamawaka, kumachweba nakunxweme I archipelagos.
Kwiqela leziqithi nakumachibi awude udinge isikhephe.
Nangona iqela leziqithi ezisenxwemeni kunye namachibi emakhulu ngokwaneleyo ukuba kungangena isikhephe, izikhitshana okanye ii-kayak zibonelela ngamava ahlukileyo.
Izikhephe yindlela yokuchitha ixesha kwisizwe saseFinland, kukho umyinge wesikhephe kubantu abasixhenxe okanye abasibhozo.
Lena iqhathaniswa nge Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, kodwa ke izimele (umzekelo e Netherlands inani linye kumashumi amane).
Ibhomu le-fission lisebenza ngohlelo lokuthi lithathe amandla liwahlanganise njenge-nucleus kanye namaprothoni amaningi namanyutroni.
Kufana nokugingqela ikalishi elisindayo phezulu egqumeni. Ukuhlukanisa i-nucleus futhi bese kukhululwa amanye walawo mandla.
Amanye ama-athomu anobuphakathi obuxegayo okusho ukuthi avame ukuphuka lapho eqhikinyezwa kancane noma lapho engaqhikinyezwanga.
Isiqhushumbhisi se-fission sisebenza kumthetho othi kuthatha amandla ukudibanisa i-nucleus enee-proton nee-neutron ezininzi.
Kufana nokunyusa itroli usiya phezulu endulini. Ukwahlula kwakhona le nucleus kukhupha amanye alo mandla.
Ezinye ii-athomu zine-nuclei engazinzanga oko kuthetha ukuba zihlala ziqhekeka ngaphandle kokukrokra okuncinci okanye ukungabikho.

Nakuba lisetshenziswa kabanzi, ikakhulukazi phakathi kwabantu abangewona amaRomany, igama elithi "Gypsy" kaningi lithathwa njengelokwedelela ngenxa yokuhlanganiswa kwalo nezinto ezimbi eziyiphutha ezishiwo abanye kanye nemibono enganembile ngabantu bamaRomany.
Nangona lisetyenziswa kakhulu, ingakumbi kwabanngengawo amaRomani, igama u-"Gypsy" lijongwa njengesithuko kuba lidityaniswa neengcinga ezimbi fkunye nokubacingela kakubi abantu abangamaRomani.
Ukudla kwaseJalimane okubhakwayo kuhle empeleni, futhi eBavaria, kunothile futhi kuhlukile, kuyafana nalokho kwasendaweni engumakhelwane engaseningizimu, i-Austria.
Ukudla okubhakwayo kwezithelo kuvamile, okunama-apula aphekwayo afakwa ezintweni ezibhakwayo unyaka wonke, kanye nama-cherry namapulamu evela ngehlobo.

Okuningi kokudla kwaseJalimane okubhakiwe kubuye kube nama-almondi, izindlubu zomhezela, kanye nezinye izindlubu zemithi. Amakhekhe athandwayo avame ukuhambisana kahle kakhulu nenkomishi yekhofi enamandla.
Uma ufuna uphayi omncane kodwa onothile, zama lokho okubizwa kuye ngendawo ngokuthi iBerliner, iPfannkuchen noma iKrapfen.
Izinto ezibhakiweyo zaseJamani zimnandi, kwaye eBavaria, zinkulu kwaye ngokufanayo nezo zommelwane wayo osemazantsi, i-Ostriya.
Ixhaphikile intlama yeziqhamo, ama-apile ayaphekwa abe yintlama unyaka wonke, wona amaqunube neeplam zenziwa ngehlobo.
Ezinye izinto ezibhakwe eJamani zidla ngokuba nee-almonds, ii-hazelnuts kunye namanye amantongomane. Iikeyiki ezithandwayo zidla ngokuhamba kakuhle nekofu esisitshoqolo.
Ukuba ufuna encinci kodwa enesondlo ipheysri, zama ngokukwengingqi ibizwa ngokuba yiBerliner, yiPfannkuchen okanye yiKrapfen.
Siza ukhumbule ukuthi empeleni uvakashela ithuna okungcwatshwe kulo abantu abaningi, kanye nendawo ebaluleke kakhulu kubantu abaningi basemhlabeni.

Kusenabesilisa kanye nabesifazane abaningi abaphilayo abahlala lapha, kanye nabaningi abanabathandekayo babo ababulewe noma abasebenze baze bafela lapha, amaJuda kanye nokungebona amaJuda ngokufanayo.
Siza uphathe le ngosi ngaso sonke isithunzi, isizotha kanye nenhlonipho eyifanele. Ungenzi amahlaya ngokuQothulwa kwesizwe noma ama-Nazi.
Musa ukungcolisa isiza ngokuphawula noma ukwenza imifanekiso esodongeni ezakhiweni.
Nceda ukhumbule ukuba eneneni utyelela ingcwaba ekungcwatywe kulo abantu abaninzi, kwakunye nokuba yindawo ebaluleke ngendlela engathethekiyo kubantu abaninzi emhlabeni wonke.
Asemaninzi amadoda namabhinqa aphilayo akwazi ukusinda ngexesha aye lapha, nabanye abaninzi abanezihlobo zabo ziye zabulawa okanye zasetyenziswa de zafa apho, amaYuda nabangengomaYuda kuyafana.
Nceda uyiphathe lesayithi ngembeko nentlonipho eyidingayo. Sukuhlekisa ngokubulawa kwabantu ngamaNazi okanye ngeHolocaust.
Ungayonakalisi le ndawo ngokubhala okanye ngokukrola nge-graffiti kwizakhiwo.
Uhambo lwesikole seluyingxenye enkulu yekilasi. Kaningi uthisha angathanda ukuyisa abafundi bakhe ezindaweni lapho kungafikeki khona ngohambo lwebhasi.

Ezobuchwepheshe zinikeza isisombululo ngohambo lwesikole olubukeka njengolwangempela. Abafunda bangabuka imivubukulo yasemnyuziyamu, bavakashele indawo yokugcina izinhlanzi, noma bajabulele ubuhle bobuciko belokhu behlezi nekilasi labo.
Ukuhlanganyela uhambo lwesikole cishe enye indlela enhle kakhulu yokucabangisisa ohambweni nokwabelana ngokwenzekile namakilasi wesikhathi esizayo.

Ngokwesibonelo, unyaka ngamunye abafundi abavela eSikoleni saseBennet eNyakatho Carolina baklama iwebhusayithi ngohambo lwabo lokuya Enhlokodolobha Yezwe, unyaka ngamunye amawebhusayithi akhiwa kabusha futhi, kodwa izinhlobo ezindala ziyagcinwa kuyi-inthanethi ukuthi isebenze njengencwadi yokugcina izinto.
Ukuhambela ezemfundo yinxalenye enkulu yayo nayiphi na iklasi. Ngokufuthi utishala uthanda ukusa abafundi bakhe kwiindawo ekungenakuhanjwa ngebhasi xa kusiyiwa kuzo.
Itekhnoloji inikezela isisombululo ngohambo lwentsimi ebonakalayo. Abafundi banokujonga kwizinto zakudala, bandwendwele i-aquarium, okanye babone ubugcisa obuhle ngelixa behleli kwiklasi yabo.
Ukuthatha uhambo phantse yenye indlela yozikhumbhuza kwaye nixoxe izimvo nabafundi kwikamva.

Umzekelo, unyaka nonyaka abafundi abavela kwiSikolo iBennet eMantla Carolina bayila iwebhusayithi malunga nohambo lwabo oluya kwi-State Capital, unyaka nonyaka iwebhusayithi iyalungiswa, kodwa iinguqulelo ezindala zigcinwa kwi-Intanethi ukuze zisebenze njenge-scrapbook.
Wonke amabizo, kanye negama elithi Sie kuwe, ahlala aqala ngosonhlamvukazi, ngisho noma ephakathi komusho.
Lena indlela enhle yokuhlukanisa phakathi kwezenzo ezinye kanye nezinto.

Ngokobufakazi obukhona kwenza ukufunda kube lula, nakuba ukubhala ngandlelathile kwenziwa inkimbinkimbi ngenxa yesidingo sokuthola ukuthi isenzo noma isiphawulo sisetshenziswa ngohlobo oluphathelene nosobizo.
Izibizo, futhi negama u-Sie, ahlala eqala ngombhalo omkhulu, noba sekuphakathi kwesivakalisi.
Le yindlela ebalulekileyo yokwahlula phakathi kwezenzi kunye nezinto.
Isenokwenza nokufunda kube lula, nangona ukubhala kusenokuba nzima ngenxa yokuba kufuneka wazi ukuba akudlalwanga ngamagama na saza isenzi okanye isicacisi-sokwenza sasetyenziswa njengesibizo.

Abantu babazi ngezakhi zamakhemikhali eziyisisekelo njengegolide, isiliva, kanye nethusi kusukela endulo, njengoba lezi zingatholakala endalweni ngohlobo lwendabuko futhi kulula kakhulu uguzigubha ngamathuluzi wasendulo.
U-Aristotle, isazi sefilosofi, wayenombono wokuthi zonke izinto zenziwe ingxube yento eyodwa noma ezengeziwe kwezine ezingumsuka wezinto zonke. Bezingumhlaba, amanzi, umoya, kanye nomlilo.

Lokhu bekucishe kufane nezigaba ezine zezinto ezikhona (ngesigaba esifanayo): eziqinile, uketshezi, igesi, kanye ne-plasma, nakuba abuye aba nombono wokuthi zingashintsha zibe izinto ezintsha ezakha lokho esikubonayo.

Abantu bayazi malunga nezinto ezisisiseko zeekhemikhali ezinje ngegolide, isilivere, nobhedu kwakudala, njengoko zonke zinokufunyanwa kwindalo ngendlela yemveli kwaye zilula kakhulu kum ngezixhobo zamandulo.
UAristotle, intanda-bulumko, wathi yonke into yenziwe ngumxube wento enye ukuya kwezine. Oko kukuthi umhlaba, amanzi, umoya nomlilo.
Oku bekufana namacala amane emicimbi (ngolandelelwano olufanayo): eqinileyo, engamanzi, igesi, kunye neplasma, nangona wayecinga ukuba bayatshintsha babe zizinto ezintsha ukwenza oko sikubonayo.
Indlela yokuqala yokuthatha uhambo eyaziwayo ukuhamba ngezinyawo, abantu baqala ukuhamba beqondile eminyakeni eyizigidi ezimbili edlule ngokuvela kwe-Homo Erectus (okusho umuntu ome waqonda).
Ababalandela esikhundleni, ama-Australopithecus bawangahambi ngendlela yokuma aqonde ngokujwayelekile.

Okuchwepheshe ngokuba nyawo-mbili kutholakala emathanjeni aguquke itshe we-Australopithecus kusukela eminyakeni eyizigidi ezingu-4.2-3.9 edlule, nakuba ama-Sahelanthropus kungenzeka ayehamba ngezinyawo ezimbili ngaphambili kakhulu eminyakeni eyizigidi eziyisikhombisa edlule.
Indlela yokuqala yokuhamba yayihamba, abantu baqala ukuhamba nkqo izigidi ezibini zeminyaka eyadlulayo ngokuvela kukaHomo Erectus (kuthetha indoda ethe tye).
Abandulelayo, iAustralopithecus khange ihambe ime nkqo njengesiqhelo.

Ubungcali beBipedal bufunyenwe kwii-fossil zase-Australopithecus ukusuka kwi-4.2-3.9 yezigidi zeminyaka eyadlulayo, nangona iSahelanthropus inokuba yayihamba ngemilenze emibini kwiminyaka ezizigidi ezisixhenxe eyadlulayo.

Ijalimane bekuyisitha esivamile eMpini Yezwe 2, okwaholela ekusebenzisaneni phakathi kwe-USSR kanye neMelika. Ngokuphela kwempi ukungqubuzana kwezimiso, izinqubo kanye namasiko kwaholela ekubeni amazwe axabane.
Ngemva kweminyaka emibili yempi, ababeyimifela ndawonye empini manje sebeyizitha futhi sebeqalise Impi Ebandayo.

Kwakufanele ihlale iminyaka engu-40 elandelayo futhi kulwe kuyo ngokoqobo, amabutho abambele, ezinkundleni zempi kusukela e-Afrika kuya e-Asia, e-Afghanistan, eCuba kanye nakwezinye izindawo eziningi.

IJamani yayilutshaba lwabantu abaninzi ngeMfazwe Yesibini Yehlabathi, nto leyo eyakhokelela kwintsebenziswano phakathi kwe-USSR neMelika. Ekupheleni kwemfazwe ukungqubana kwenkqubo, nenkcubeko kwakhokelela ukuba la mazwe ohlukane.
Emva kweminyaka emibini ekupheleni kwemfazwe, ababezizihlobo baphetha bezintshaba futhi kwaqala Imfazo Ebandayo.
Ibimele ihlale iminyaka eyi-40 elandelayo ize ifunwe yimikhosi esedabini ukususela eAfrica ukuya eAsia, eAfghanistan, eCuba nakwezinye iindawo.
UbuBhuda base-Tibet busekelwe ezimfundisweni zikaBhuda, kodwa zandiswa indlela yothando yobu-mahayana nayizinqubo eziningi ezisuka kuyiYoga yaseNdiya.
Ngokuyisisekelo ubuBuddha baseTibet bulula kakhulu. Buhlanganisa iKundalini Yoga, ukuzindla kanye nendlela yothando olwamukela konke.
Nge-Kundali Yoga amandla e-Kundali (amandla okukhanyisa) avuselelwa ngokuzivocavoca ngohlobo lwe-yoga, ukuzivocavoca kokuphefumula, amazwi aphindwaphindwayo kanye nokubona ngeso lengqondo.

Isikhungo sokuzindla kwase-Tibet iYoga yesiThixo. Ngokubona ngeso lengqondo izithixo ezahlukahlukene imizila yamandla iba ehlanzekile, ama-chakra enziwa ukuthi asebenze futhi ukukhanya kokubakhona kuyakhiwa.
I-Tibetan Buddhism yakhelwe kwimfundiso zika Budda, kodwa zongezelelwa yindlela yama mahayan yothando nangendlela ezinzi ezisuka kwi Yoga yamaNdiya.
Ngokusisiseko, i-Buddhism yaseTibetan ilula kakhulu. Iquka i-Yoga yaseKundalini, ukucingisisa kunye nendlela yothando olungenamkhethe.
Nge-Kundalini Yoga amandla eKundalini (amandla okhanyiso) avuswa ngokuma kweyoga, imithambo yokuphefumla, i-mantra kunye nokubona.
Iziko lokucingisiza kweTibet yiYoga yobuThixo. Ngokubonwa kwezithixo ezahlukeneyo iindlela zamandla ziyacocwa, ii-chakras ziyenziwa zisebenze kwaye ulwazi lokukhanyiselwa luyenziwa.
Iningi lweMikhumbi yokuVakasha yase-Baltic ehlukile ihlanganisa ukuhlala isikhathi eside e-St. Petersburg, e-Russia.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi ungavakashela idolobha elingokomlando izinsuku ezimbalwa ezigcwele ube ubuyela futhi ulala emkhumbini ebusuku.
Uma uya ogwini kuphela usebenzisa uhambo lomkhumbi olufishane angeke udinge i-visa ehlukile (kusukela ngo-2009).

Eminye imikhumbi yokuvakasha iveza i-Berlin, eseJalimane ezincwajaneni zayo. Njengoba ubona ebalazweni ngenhla i-Berlin ikude kakhulu nolwandle futhi ukuvakashela idolobha akuhlanganisiwe enanini lomkhumbi wokuvakasha.
I-Baltic Cruises ezininzi zidla ngokuquka ukuhlala okongezelelekileyo e-St. Petersburg, eRashiya.
Oku kuthetha ukuba ungatyelela esi sixeko sinembali kangangeentsuku ezithile ngoxa ebusuku ulala enqanaweni.
Xa usiya enxwemeni usebenzisa izikhephe zozikhupha awuzudinga ivisa eyohlukileyo (usukela ngo-2009).
Ezinye ii-cruise zine-Berlin, i-Germany ezimpepheni zentengiso. Njengoba uzibonela kwimap ngaphezulu i-Berlin ayisondelanga tuu elwandle kwaye novakasho kuledolophu alubalwanga kwixabiso le-cruise.
Ingxubaniso ngokuyisisekelo ingxube yezinsimbi ezimbili noma ngaphezulu. Ungakhohlwa ukuthi kunezakhi eziningi eshadini lezakhi zamakhemikhali.
Izakhi ezinjengekhalsiyamu nephothaziyamu zithathwa njengensimbi. Yebo, kunezinye izinsimbi njengesiliva negolide.
Ungaba futhi nezidungo ezixutshanisiwe ezihlanganisa amanani amancane ezinto ezingezona ezensimbi njenge-carbon.
Ialloys yimixube yemethali ezimbini okanye nangaphezulu. Ungalibali ukuba zininzi ii-elementi kwi-periodic table.
Izinto ezinjenge calcium kunye ne potassium zithathwa njengezinyithi. Ewe, kukwakho nesinyithi esinjengesilivere negolide.
Unako kwakhona ukufumana ii-alloys ezibandakanya inani elincinci lezinto ezingezizo zesinyithi njengekhabhoni.
Igama elithi isilwanyakazane lisetshenziswa izazi zezinambuzane ngendlela esemthethweni yaleli qembu lezi zinambuzane.
Leli gama lidabuka ekujwayelaneni kwakudala neziMbungulu, okuyizilwanyana ezizifanelisela ngokuphila ngokudla emzimbeni wabantu.
Zombili iZimbungulu eziphila ngezinye izinambuzane neZimbungulu ezivamile zihlala esidlekeni, zifanelekele ukuphila esidlekeni noma endaweni yokuhlala yesilwane ezincela igazi laso.
Abafotayo kamva bathatha indawo yenenekazi elidala njengoko lalifuna i-lavatory. UMendoza wadutyulwa phantsi.
Eli gama lisuka kwakudala kukudityaniswa neencukuthu zebhedi, ezizinambuzane ezikwaziyo ukutya abantu.
Zombini i-Assassin-bugs kunye nee-Bed-bugs azikho nocic, zilungelelaniswe ukuze zihlale kwindlwana okanye kwizindlu zomphathi wazo.
Izihambi zingahlangabezana nezifo zezilwane ezingazijwaleyanga ezindaweni zangakuzo.
Izilokazane zingakonakalisa ukudla, zicasule, noma okubi nakakhulu zenze kusigulise, zisakaze ubuthi, noma zisakaze izifo.
Izifo ezithelelwanayo ngokwazo, noma izilwane eziyingozi ezingalimaza noma zibulale umuntu ngamandla, azivamile ukufaneleka njengezilwane ezifuywayo.
Abahamabi bangadibana nezinambuzane zezilwanyane abangaziqhelanga kwiingingqi zakomakwabo.
Izinambuzane zingakumosha ukutya, zenze ukuhlupheka, kwimeko ezinzima zibangele ialeji, zandise ithyefu ivenom, okanye zisasaze ulosuleleko.
Izifo ezosulelayo ngokwazo, okanye izilwanyana eziyingozi zingabonzakalisa okanye zibabulale abantu, akuye kuthiwe ngubhubhane.
Nakuba ukwakha amaphiramidi ngamatshe kwaqhubeka kwaze kwaba sekupheleni koMbuso Omdala, amaphiramidi aseGaza awakaze adlulwe ngobukhulu kanye nangobuhle bobuchwepheshe ekwakhiweni kwawo.
Umbuso Omusha eGibhithe lamandulo labamba ongezansi ngezikhumbuzo zabanduleli babo, ezazineminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane ubudala ngaleso sikhathi.
Nangona ukwakhiwa kweephiramidi kwilitye kwaqhubeka de kwasekupheleni koBukumkani Obudala, iiphiramidi zaseGiza zange zogqithwe ngobukhulu nangobugcisa obugqibeleleyo ezakhiwa ngazo.
Ubukumkani obutsha base-Egypt yamandulo babumangalisiwe zizikhumbuzo zabo zangaphambili, ezazingaphezulu kweminyaka eliwaka ubudala.
Imisinga yokuqhuma kungukugeleza okubuyayo okuvela emagagasini aqhamuka olwandle, ngokuvamile emadwaleni noma kokuthi akufane.
Ngenxa yethopholoji yangaphansi kwamanzi ukugeleza okubuyayo kugxile ezingxenyeni ezimbalwa ezijulile, futhi umsinga osheshayo emanzini ajulile ungakheka lapho.
Ukufa okuningi kwenzeka ngenxa yokukhathala kokuzama ukubhukuda uya emuva ngokuphambene nomsinga, okungaba yinto engenakwenzeka.
Ngokushesha ngemva kokuba uphuma emsingeni wamanzi, ukubhukudela emuva akusabi nzima ngokuvamile.
Zama ukuqonda lapho ungabambekile khona futhi noma, kuye ngamakhono akho nokuthi uphawuliwe yini, ungathanda ukulinda ukutakulwa.
Umsinga onamandla ngamaza abuyela elwandle evela elunxwemeni, amaxesha amaninzi aba kuqaqa lolwandle okanye kwindawo efanayo.
Ngenxa yodidi lwamanzi angaphantsi ukubuya kwawo kujolise kwinzulu ezimbalwa, kwaye umsinga okhawulezayo ukuya kwinzulu yamanzi uyafomisheka apho.
Abantu abaninzi babulawa kukudinwa bezama ukuqubha besilwa namandla atsalayo olwandle, into enganekufane yenzeke.
Emva nje kokuba uphumile emanzini, ukuqubha ubuyela umva kudla ngokuba nzima kunesiqhelo.
Zama ukujolisa apho ungazuphinde ubanjwe kwakhona okanye, kuxhomekeke kwizakhono zakho nokuba uye waqatshelwa na, usenokulindela ukuba uzohlangulwa.
Ama-Paralympic azokwenzeka kusukela ngomhla ka-24 Agasti kuya ku-5 Septemba 2021. Ezinye izehlakalo zizobanjelwa kwezinye izindawo eJapani yonke.
ITokyo kuzoba ilona kuphela idolobha lase-Asia eliphathe imidlalo yama-Olimpiki wasehlobo emibili, eliyiphathe ngo-1964.
Uma ubhukhe indiza kanye nendawo yokulala ngo-2020 ngaphambi kokuthi kumenyezelwe ukuhlehliswa, ungase ube sesimweni esinzima.
Izinkambiso zokukhansela ziyahluka, kodwa kusukela ngasekupheleni kukaMashi izinkampiso eziningi zokukhansela ngenxa ye-coronavirus azifiki kuJulayi 2020, ngenkathi okwakuhlelwe ngayo ama-Olimpiki.
Kulindeleke ukuthi amathikithi amaningi womcimbi azobiza phakathi kuka-¥2,500 no-¥130,000, futhi amathikithi avamile abiza u-¥7,000.
Ii-Paralympics zizoqala ukusukela nge-24 kweyeThupha ukuqhina nge-5 kweyoMsintsi ngo-2021. Emnye imidlalo izodlalelwa kwezinye iindawo e-Japan.
I-Tokyo iza kuba siso sodwa isixeko sase-Asia esikhe sabamba imidlalo yee-Olimpiki kabini, ekubeni yayikhe yabamba imihlalo yango-1964.
Ukuba uye wabhukisha uhambo ngenqwelo moya kunye nendawo yokuhlala noka-2020 ngaphambi kokuba ukuhlehliswa kuchazwa, kusenokwenzeka ube nemeko engaqinisekanga.
Iipolisi zokurhoxisa ziyahluka, kodwa ukususela ekupheleni kukaMatshi, ukurhoxa ngenxa yekhorona bekungadluleli kuJulayi 2020, ixesha apho bekumele kukho imidlalo yeOlimpikhi.
Kulindeleke ukuba amatikiti ezinto ezininzi aza kubiza phakathi kwe-¥2,500 ne-¥130,000, yaye amaxabiso aqhelekileyo aya kubiza malunga ne-¥7,000.
Imicabango yezizathu zokushintsha kwabantu igxile ezintweni ezishukumisa abantu noma ezithinta izinhliziyo zabo.
Le mibono isikisela ukuthi abantu banezidingo ezithile kanye/noma izifiso eziye zavalelwa ngaphakathi njengoba zikhulela ekubeni zindala.
Le mibono ihlola ukuthi yini eyenza abanye abantu bafune izinto abazifunayo nokuthi yiziphi izinto endaweni yabo ezizobenza benze noma bangenzi ezinye izinto.
Imicabango eshukumisayo emibili ethandwayo yiHierarchy of Needs Theory kaMaslow kanye neTwo Factor Theory kaHertzberg.
Ithiyori zomxholo zijolise ekufumaneni into eyenza abantu babeke uphawu okanye babhenele kubo.
Ezi theory zicebisa ukuthi abantu banezidingo ezithile okanye ulangazelelo oluye lwagcinwa lingaphakathi njengoko umntu ekhula.
Ezi ngcingane zijonga ukuba yintoni eyenza abantu abathile benze izinto abazenzayo yaye ziziphi izinto kwindawo abahlala kuyo ezibenza benze izinto ezithile.
Iithiyori ezimbini ezidumileyo zii-Themous's Hierarchy of Needs Theory kunye ne-Herzberg's Two Factor Theory.
Idatha yesayensi yohlelo lwezinzwa inikeza ukufakazi obungokoqobo bendlela engokomcabango yokuhlola ukucabanga. Ngakho-ke, inciphisa umkhakha wocwaningo futhi iwenze unembe kakhudlwana.
Ukuhlanganiswa ngokuqhathaniswa phakathi kwesayensi yezifo zobuchopho kanye nokuziphatha kusekela ososayensi ocwaningweni lwabo.
Kudala kwaziwa ukuthi izinhlobo ezihlukile zokulimala kobuchopho, ukuhlukumezeka, izilonda, kanye nokhwekhwe kuthinta ukuziphatha futhi kubangela ushintsho kokunye kokusebenza kwengqondo.
Ukuba khona kwezobuchwepheshe ezintsha kusivumela ukuba sibone futhi sihlole ukwakheka kwengqondo kanye nezinqubo ezingakaze zibonwe ngaphambili.
Lokhu kusinika ukwaziswa okuningi nezinto zokwakha imishini yokulingisa esisiza siqonde indlela zokusebenza kwengqondo.
Idatha yeNeurobilogy inikeza ubundgqina obuphathekayo betheory ephanda ngengqondo. Ngoko ke iyalucutha uphando ilwenze lungqale mpela.
Uzalwano phakathi kwe-pathology yengqondo nemikhwa ixhasa ososayensi kuphando
Kudala kusaziwa ukuba iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zomonakalo wobuchopho, ukwenzakala, izilonda, kunye nezilonda zichaphazela indlela yokuziphatha kwaye zibangele notshintsho kwimisebenzi ethile yengqondo.
Ukunyuka kwetekhnoloji entsha kusenza sikwazi ukubona nokuphanda ulwakhiwo lobuchopho kunye neenkqubo ezingazange zibonwe ngaphambili.
Lena isinika ulwazi oluninzi nezixhobo zokwakho imodeli zokulingisa ezisinceda siqonde okuqhubeka ezinqondweni zethu.
I-Apia inhlokodolobha yaseSamoa. Idolobha lisesiqhingini sase-Upolu futhi linabantu abangaphansi nje kuka-40,000.
I-Aphiya yasungulwa ngawo-1850 futhi yaba yinhlokodolobha engokomthetho yaseSamowa kusukela ngo-1959.
Itheku bekuyindawo yempi esabekalo yemikhumbi lapho kwakuhlangene izaqha khona ngo-1889 lapho imikhumbi eyisikhombisa yaseJalimane, eMelika, kanye naseBrithani yenqabe ukusuka ethekwini.
Yonke imikhumbi yacwila, ngaphandle komkhumbi owodwa wase-Britain. Cishe abantu abangu-200 baseMelika naseJalimane balahlekelwa yizimpilo zabo.
Phakathi nomzabalazo wokuzimela ohlelwe yinhlangano kaMau, umhlangano wokuthula edolobheni waholela ekubulaweni kwenkosi yezwe uTupua Tamasese lealofi III.
I-Apia likomkhulu le-Samoa. Idolophu ikwisiqithi se-Upolu futhi sinenani labantu elingaphantsi nje ko-40,000.
I Apia yasekwa ngo 1850s yaye iyi capital egunyazisiweyo yase of Samoa ukususela ngo 1959.
Ihabha yayisisiza senqanawa yomkhosi waselwandle ngo-1889 xa iinqanawa ezisixhenxe ezivela eJamani, e-US, nase-Bhritane zala ukulishiya elo zibuko.
Zonke iinqanawa zazika, ngaphandle kwenye yaseBritani. Baphantse babeyi-200 abantu baseMerika nabaseJamani abaphulukana nobomi babo.
Ngelixa lomzabalanzo wenkululeko owawuququzelelwa ngumgushuzo we Mau, indibanisela enoxolo yahlangana kwidolophu yanemiphumela yokubulawa kwenkosi u Topua Tamasese Leaof III.
Kunezingu eziningi, ngenxa yokuthi i-Auckland ingapha nangapha kwamatheku amabili. Ezithandwa kakhulu zisezindaweni ezintathu.
Amabhisi wasoGwini oluseNyakatho (esifundeni seTheku eliseNyakatho) asoLwandlekazini lwePhasifiki futhi asuka e-Long Bay ngasenyakatho kuya e-Devonport eningizimu.
Kucishe kube izingu ezinesihlabathi eziyindawo ephephile yokubhukuda, kanti kugcwele nemithunzi eyenziwa izihlahla ze-pohutukawa.
Izingu zase-Tamaki Drive ziseThekwini lase-Waitemata, edolobheni labadla izambane likapondo e-Mission Bay naseSt Heliers e–Auckland eMaphakathi.
Lawa amabhishi wemindeni aba nabantu abaningi ngezinye izikhathi anezitolo ezihlukahlukene ezigcwele ogwini. Ukubhukuda kuphephile.
Luninzi unxweme oluneendawo zokudada ngenxa yokuba i-Auckland iphakathi kwamazibuko amabini. Ezona ndawo zithandwayo zikwimimandla emithathu.
iindawo ezise-North Shore (kwingingqi ye-North Harbour) zikuLwandlekazi lwePasifiki yaye zisukela e-Long Bay emntla ziye e-Devonport emzantsi.
Phantse zonke ziilwandle ezinesanti kwaye ezikhuselekileyo ekubhukudeni. Zikwanayo nemithunzi ebangelwa yimiti I pohutukwana.
Unxweme lweTamaki Drive lukwiZibuko lase-Waitermata, kwindawo yeengcungcu zase-Mission Bay nase-St Helliers, unye ne-St Heliers eCentral Auckland.
Ngamanye amaxesha ngamalwandle adla ngokuzaliswa zintsapho yaye aneevenkile ezahlukahlukeneyo ezingasenxwemeni. Ukudada kukhuselekile.
Izazi eziningi zesayensi yemivubukulo namuhla zikholelwa ukuthi iqembu elilodwa lama-dinosaur laqhubeka liphila futhi lisaphila namuhla. Siwabiza ngezinyoni.
Abantu abaningi abazithathi njengama-dinosaur ngoba zinezimpaphe futhi ziyakwazi ukundiza.
Kodwa kunezinto eziningi ngezinyoni ezisafana ne-dinosaur.
Zinezinyawo ezinocwecwe nezinzipho, zibekela amaqanda, futhi zihamba ngezinyawo zazo ezimbili zasemuva njengeT-Rex.
Uninzi lwee-paleontologists namhlanje lukholelwa ukuba iqela elinye leedayinososi lasinda kwaye lisaphila nanamhlanje. Sizibiza ngokuba ziintaka.
Uninzi lwabantu aluzicingeli ukuba zidayinososi kuba zineentsiba kwaye ziyabhabha.
Kodwa zininzi izinto ngeentaka ezijongeka njengedayinasosi.
Zineenyawo ezinamaxolo kunye neenzipho, zizalela amaqanda, kwaye zihamba ngemilenze yazo yomibini yangasemva njengeT-Rex.
Iningi lokuphindaphinda kuyifiziyoloji nasekuziphatheni okubonwayo ngokuvamile kuxhomeke ngokuyinhloko ekubeni khona kwemijikelezo evela phakathi kanye nokwenziwa kwako ngamawashi emvelo.
Izigqi zezikhathi ezithile, okungekhona ukusabela nje kwezinkomba ezingaphandle, kubikiwe ezidalweni eziningi eziphilayo, kuhlanganise amabhakithiliya, isikhunta, izitshalo, kanye nezilwane.
Amawashi endalo azivuselela amandla azoqhubeka esebenza emjikelwezweni okhululekile ngisho noma enkathini ongeke ukwazi ukuyicabanga.
Abanintsi baqaphela izingqi kwimbonakalo nakwizimbo ezithi zixhomekeke ikakhulu kubukho be saykile ezi endogenous nophuhliso lwazo kwixesha lwendalo.
Isingqisho samaxesha ngamaxesha, ezingeyompendulo nje kwimiba yangaphandle yamaxesha athile, sele sibhalelwe izinto ezininzi eziphilayo, nee ibhaktiriya, ifungi, izityalo kunye nezilwanyana.
Iiwotshi zebhayoloji zizenzela ii-oscillator eziza kuqhubeka nokuhamba zijikeleza mahala nokuba akukho zimpawu zangaphandle.
IGoma yidolobha laseDemocratic Republic of Congo elise mpumalanga eduzane naseRwanda eliheha izivakashi.
Ngo-2002 iGoma yabhujiswa udaka olushisayo oluvela kuyintabamlilo iNyirogongo eyagqiba eminingi yemigwaqo yasedolobheni, ikakhulukazi maphakathi nedolobha.
Nakuba iGoma iphephile ngokwezinga elithile, noma ikuphi ukuvakasha ngaphandle kweGoma kumelwe kucwaningwe ukuze uzwisise isimo sokulwa okusesifundazweni saseNyakatho Kivu.
Idolobha libuye libe isiqu sokugibela intabamlilo iNyiragongo kanye nokunye kokulandelela amaGorila waseNtabeni okubiza kancane kunakho konke e-Afrika.
Uma usebenzisa i-boda-boda (itekisi lesithuthuthu) ukuhambahamba eGoma. Inani elivamile (lasendaweni) u-~500 wama-Franc wase-Congo uma ufuna uhambo olufishane.
I-Goma sisixeko esithandwa ngabakhenkethi saseDemocratic Republic of Congo kwelo cala lisempuma kufutshane neRwanda.
Ngo-2002 iGoma yatshatyalaliswa ludaka lwentaba-mlilo iNyiragongo eyangcwaba uninzi lwezitrato zedolophu, ingakumbi umbindi wedolophu.
Ngelixa iGoma ikhuselekile ngokufanelekileyo, konke ukundwendwela ngaphandle kweGoma kufuneka kuphandwe ukuze kuqondwe imeko yomlo oqhubekayo kwiphondo laseMantla eKivu.
Esi sixeko sikwayeyona ndawo yokuqalisa ukunyuka i-volcano iNyiragongo, kunye nezinye iintaba ezingaduriyo ukozonyuka ekuthiwa ziiGorilla zaseAfrika.
Ungasebenzisa iboda-boda (iteksi esisisithuthuthu) ukuze uye kwiindawo eziseGoma. Ixabiso eliqhelekileyo (lasekuhlaleni) liyi-500 Congolese Francs xa uhambo lulufutshane.
Kukhona isiko lokuhlala ungalali kuze kuhlwe ngobusuku bePhasika endaweni ethile ukuze ubone ukuphuma kwelanga.
Ngokuqinisekile kunezincazelo ezingokwenkolo yobuKrestu zaleli siko, kodwa kungenzeka kube isiko langaphambi kobuKrestu laseNtwasahlobo lokuZala.

Amaningi amasonto akudala asazibamba Izinkonzo zePhasika njalo ngoMgqibelo ebusuku ngesikhathi sempelasonto yePhasika, nebandla nalo libungaze ngokuhlanganyela ezinzulwini zobusuku kubungazwa ukuvuka kukaKrestu.
Kukho isithethe sokungalali ngobusuku be-Ista kwindawo apho ilanga linokubonakala khona xa liphuma.
Zikhona kakade ingcanciso zonkolo yobuKristu zalenkcubeko, kodwa kusenokwenzeka ukuba yayikho kwangaphambi kwe Chistrian Spring nesiko lokuChumisa.
Iicawa ezininzi zomthonyama ziye zibe Nomlindo we-Ista ngokuhlwa ngoMgqibelo ngempela veki ye-Ista, aze amabandla abhiyoze ezinzulwini zobusuku ebhiyozela ukuvuka kukaKrestu.
Akungabazeki ukuthi, uma wazi ulimi loThando, kuyoba lula ngawe ukufunda isiPutukezi.
Nokho, abantu abazi ulimi lwesiPeyini kancane bangashesha baphethe ngokuthi isiPutukezi siseduze kakhulu kangangokuthi akudingeki ukusifunda ngokuhlukile.
Akuyo mfuneko ukutsho, ukuba wazi ulwimi loThando, kuzobalula ukuba ufunda isi-Portuguese.
Nangona kunjalo, abantu abazi iSpanish kancinci banokukhawuleza bagqibe kwelokuba isiPhuthukezi sisondele ngokwaneleyo kangangokuba akufuneki ukuba sifundwe sodwa.
I-Argentina idume ngokuba nelinye lamaqembu kanye nabadlali be-polo abahamba phambili emhlabeni.
Umncintiswano omkhulu kunayo yonke wonyaka wenzeka ngoDisemba ezinkundleni ze-polo eLas Cañitas.
Imincintiswano emincane kanye nemidlalo ingabuye ibonwe lapha ngezinye izikhathi zonyaka.
Ukuze uthole izindaba zemincintiswano kanye nendawo yokuthenga amathikithi wemidlalo yepholo, hlola i-Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
IArgentina yaziwa ngokuba lelinye lamaqela anabadlali abaphambili kwipolo kunye nabadlali ehlabathini.
Eyona tumente inkulu yonyaka iba ngoDecember kumapala ezemidlalo ye-polo eLas Cañitas.
Iithonamenti ezincincane nemidlalo ziyakwazi nokubukelwa apha ngamanye amaxesha onyaka.
Ukufumana iindaba kwiitumente kunye nalapho ungathenga khona amatikiti kwimidlalo yepolo, jonga iAsociacion Argentina de Polo.

Izinkampani ezithutha impahla zikhokhelwa kahle ngokuthumela impahla ngokushehsa. Ngokuvamile, isikhathi sibalulekile ngamaphepha ebhizinisi, impahla ethengwayo ukuze idayiswe noma enye impahla edingekayo ukuze kwenziwe ukulungisa okusheshayo.
Kwezinye izindlela, izinkampani ezinkudlwana zinezindiza zazo, kodwa kwezinye izindlela nezinkampani ezincane bekunezinkinga.
Uma bebathumele zonke izinto ngebhanoyi, kwezinye izindlela bekuzothatha izinsuku ukwehlisa imithwalo nokudlula kwabahlola amaphepha.
Indlela elula yokuyingenisa ngokushesha ukuthi uyithumele njengomthwalo ohloliwe. Imithetho yezinkampani zezindiza angeke ibavumele ukuthumela umthwalo ngaphandle komgibeli, okuyilapho ungena khona.

Amashishini okuthumela abhatalwa kakuhle ngoku fikisa imithwalo yabantu ngokukhawulezisileyo. Ngokwesiqhelo, ixesha libalulekile neempepha zeshishini, amabhaso namalungu are phindeneyo ukwenzela ukulungiswa kwezinto.
Kwezinye iindlela, iinkampani ezinkulu ziba neenqwelo ntaka zazo, kodwa kwezinye iindlela nakwiinkampani ezincinane kubekho ingxaki.
Ukuba bathumela izinto ngohambo lwasemoyeni, kwezinye iindlela zinokuthatha iintsuku ukuba zidlule kwindawo yokwathula impahla nendawo yokuhlola abantu nezinto ezingenayo kwizikhululo zeenqwelo-moya.

Eyona ndlela yokuyihambisa ngokukhawuleza ibe kukuyithumela njengempahla efakwa kwinqwelo ntaka. Imithetho yohambo ngenqwelo ntaka ayizukubavumela ukuba bathumele impahla engahambi nomniniyo, kulapho ungena khona.

Nakuba i-AI inomqondo oqinilile wezindaba eziqanjiwe zesayensi, i-AI yenza ingxenye ebalulekile kakhulu yesayensi yamakhompyutha, ebukana nokuziphatha, ukufunda kanye nokusebenza komshini kokuhlakanipha.
Ucwaningo lwezamarobothi luhlanganisa ukwenza imishini yenze ngokuzenzakalekayo imisebenzi edinga ukucabanga komuntu.
Izibonelo zihlanganisa ukulawula, ukuhlela nokwenza isheduli, ikhono lokuphendula ukubhula nemibuzo yekhasimende, kanye nokuqaphela ngesandla, izwi nobuso.
Izinto ezinjalo zibe izimiso ezihlukile, ezigxila ekunikezeni izisombululo zezinkinga ezingokoqobo zokuphila.

Uhlelo lwe-AI manje ngokuvamile lusetshenziswa emkhakheni wezomnotho, ezokwelapha, ubunjiniyela kanye nempi, njengoba kwakhiwe ezinhlelweni zokusebenza zamakhompyutha wasekhaya amaningana nemidlalo yevidiyo.
Nangona iAI inolinganiso olungeyonyani lwesayensi,I AI yenza isiseko esibalulekileyo kwicandelo lwekhompyutha sayensi ejongene nezimbo,ukufunda nobungqondi bomashini.
Uphando kwi-AI lubandakanya ukwenza oomatshini abazenzekelayo imisebenzi efuna isimilo esikrelekrele.

Imizekelo iquka ukulawula, ukuceba nokubeka ixesha, ukukwazi ukuphendula izinto zabathengi ezingalunganga nemibuzo, nokukwazi ukubona ukuba ibisisandla sikabani ebesibhala, ukwazi ukufanisa ilizwi nobuso.
Izinto ezinjalo zibe ngamacandelo ahlukeneyo, ajolise ekunikezeleni izisombululo kwiingxaki zobomi bokwenyani.
Inkqubo ye-AI ngoku ihlala isetyenziswa kumacandelo ezoqoqosho, amayeza, ubunjineli kunye nomkhosi, njengoko sele yakhiwe kwikhompyuter kunye nokusetyenziswa kwesoftware yomdlalo wevidiyo.
Ukuthuka ngoba usekhaya kuza kuqala kunalokho kuthuka okwenzeka uma uvakashele endaweni ongayazi (ngakho ukujabula kuba kuncane), kuthathe isikhathi, futhi kungaya ngokuya kwande.
Izihambi ezikuthole kulula ukujwayela isiko elisha kwesinye isikhathi zikuthola kunzima ukujwayela isiko lazo lendabuko futhi.
Lapho ubuyela ekhaya usuka phesheya, kuzodingeka ujwayele isiko elisha neminye yemikhuba yakho oyilahlile kusukela ezweni lakini.
Lapho uya phesheya okokuqala, abantu kungenzeka ukuthi babebekezela futhi beqonda, bazi ukuthi izivakashi uma zifika ezweni elisha zidinga ukujwayela.
Abantu kungezeka bangalindeli ukuthi ukulinda kanye nokuqonda nakho kubalulekile ezivakashini ezibuyela ekhaya.
Ukothuswa kukubuyela kukhawuleza kubekho kunokothuswa yinkcubeko (kudla ngokubakho ixesha lokuyiqhela, kubakho ixesha elide, kwaye kuba mandundu kakhulu.
Abahambi abadla ngokufumanisa kulula ukuqhelana nenkcubeko entsha ngamanye amaxesha baye babe nobunzima bokuphinda baqhelane nenkcubeko yabo.
Xa uphindela ekhaya emva kokuhlala phesheya, sowuqhele izinto ezohlukileyo futhi sowulahle imikhwa yesiko lakowenu.
Xa waya kwelinye ilizwe okokuqala, kusonkwenzeka ukuba abantu babe nomonde bekuqonda, besazi ukuba abantu abahambele kwilizwe elitsha badinga ukuliqhela.
Amabantu basenokungayicingeli into yokuba ukunyamezela nokuqonda nako kuyafuneka kubahambi ababuyela emakhaya.
Inhlokodolobha yaseMoldova yiChișinău. Ulimi lwendawo isiRomaniya, kodwa isiRashiya sisetshenziswa kabanzi.
I-Moldova iriphabhuliki yezinhlanga eziningi ehlushwe imibango yobuhlanga.
Ngo-1994, lombango waholela ekumenyezelweni kweRiphabhuliki yokuzimisa yaseTransnistria empumalanga Moldova, enohulumeni wayo nohlobo lwemali kodwa engaqashelwa yinoma yiliphi izwe eliyilungu le-UN.
Izixhumanisi zezomnotho zenziwe kabusha phakathi kwalezi zingxenye zase-Moldova yize behlulekile ezinxoxweni zepolitiki.
Ubunikazi bawo abukaziwa okwamanje njengoba akekho.
Ikomkhulu laseMoldova yiChişinău. Ulwimi lwasekuhlaleni sisiRomaniya, kodwa isiRashiya sisetyenziswa ngokubanzi.
IMoldova yiriphabliki eneentlanga ezininzi eye yachatshazelwa yimilo yekhaya.
Ngo 1994, ingxabano yakhokhela ekudalweni kwe Republiki i-Transnistria esempuma ye-Moldova, enorhulumente wayo nemali yayo kodwa ayigqalwa naleliphi na ilizwe elililungu le UN.
Amakhonkco ezoqoqosho aphinde amiselwa Phakathi kwezi ndawo ze-Moldova nangona uthethathethwano lwezopolitiko lungaphumelelanga.
Uninzi lwabantu lunqula kubu-Othodoki bobuKrestu.
Indawo ephakathi kwe-Point Marion ne-Fairmont yenza izimo zokushayela ezinzima kakhulu eMgwaqweni omkhulu wase-Buffalo-Pittsburgh, odlula njalo ezindaweni ezingenabantu zasemahlathini.
Uma ungajwayele ukushayela emigwaqweni yasemaphandleni, hlala uphapheme: izindawo eziyimiqansa kakhulu, izindlela eziwungcingo, kanye namajika amabi agcwele.

Ukulinganiselwa kwesivinini okusemabhodini kuphansi ngokuphawulekayo kunasezingxenyeni zangaphambili nezilandelayo — ngokuvamile u-35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — futhi ukukunakisisa kubalulekile nakakhulu kunokungakunakisisi.
Ngokumangazayo, nokho, insiza yefoni ephathekayo inamandla kakhulu lapha kunezindlela eziningi eziningi zomzila, isibonelo, Izindawo Zasendle zasePennsylvania.
Indlela eyoluleka phakathi kwe Point Marion ne Fairmont yenza eyona meko icela umngeni kwimeko zokuqhuba kwi Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, usoloko udlula rhoqo kwindawo ezinezikhuni.
Ukuba awuqhelanga ukuqhuba kwiindlela zasezilalini, hlala uphaphile: iindawo ezehla kakhulu, iindlela ezincinane, kunye neekona zixhaphake kakhulu
Eziposiweyo izimiselo zesantya ziyaqapheleka ukuba zingeneno kunezangaphambili kwaye iindawana ezithile— ikakhulu u-35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — kwaye ukuzithobela kubaluleke nangakumbi kunokunye.
Kodwa okubangela umdla, iinkqubo zomnxxeba zinamandla apha kunezinye iindlela, umzekelo i-Pennsylvania Wilds.
Imisele yamanzi emaphakathi nezwe kungaba umbono omuhle wokusekela iholide kuwo.
Ngokwesibonelo ukuvakashela izigodlo eSigodini saseLoire, isigodi saseRhine noma ukuthatha uhambo ngomkhumbi oluya emadolobheni athakazelisayo kuyiDanube noma ukuhamba ngesikebhe kuyi-Erie Canal.
Babuye basho nezindlela zemizila yokuqwala izintaba nokuhamba ngamabhisikili.
Indlela zamanzi eziphakathi komhlaba zingaba yitheme elungileyo yokukhenketha.
Ngokomzekelo xa utyelela iinqaba eziseLoire Valley, kwintlambo yeRhine okanye ukuhamba ngesikhitshane ukuya kwindawo ezinomtsalane ezikwiDanube okanye ukukhwela isikhephe kwi-Erie Canal.
Basose bachaza indlela ezithandwayo zoku hyka nomzila noku saykilisha.
Nakuba ukufunda okusekelwe kuyiphrojekthi kumelwe kwenze ukufunda kube lula futhi kuthakazelise kakhudlwana, izibhaxa zenza okwengeziwe.
I-scaffolding akuyona indlela yokufunda kodwa kunalokho insiza enikeza usizo kubantu ngabanye abafunda okusha njengokusebenzisa uhlelo olusha lwekhompyutha noma ukuqala iphrojekthi entsha.
Ama-Scaffolds angaba wekhompyutha futhi abe ngokoqobo, ngamanye amagama, uthisha uwuhlobo lwe-scaffold kodwa kunjalo nangomuntu omncane wocingo lokuhlanganisa amaphepha kuyi-Microsoft Office.
Izibhaxa zekhompyutha zifakwe phakathi kohlelo lokusebenza futhi zenzelwe ukubuza, ukushukumisa, kanye nokuchaza izinqubo okungenzeka ukuthi bekunzima ukuthi abafundi basebenze ngazo bebodwa.
Ngelixa ukufunda okujoliswe kwiprojekthi kumele kwenze imfundo ibelula yaye inikise umdla, Inqwanqwa le scaffolding ithabatha unyawo ukubheka phambili.
I-scaffolding akuyondlela yokufunda kodwa yindlela yoncedo enikezela inkxaso kubantu abafunda izifundo ezintsha njengokusebenzisa inkqubo yekhomputha okanye ukuqala umsebenzi omtsha.
Ii-Scaffolds zinokubonakala ziyinyani kwaye ziyinyani, ngamanye amagama, utitshala luhlobo lwe-scaffold kodwa kunjalo nanomntu we-paperclip kwi-Microsoft Office.
Ii-Scaffolds ezibonakalayo zangaphakathi ngaphakathi kwisoftware kwaye zenzelwe ukubuza, ukukhawulezisa, kunye nokuchaza iinkqubo ezinokuba ngumceli mngeni wokuba umfundi aziphathe yedwa.
Noma ubani ohlela ukuvakashela izwe elizobhekwa njengesizinda sempi kumelwe athole ukuqeqeshwa okukhethekile.
Usesho kuyi-inthanethi “loKudla kwendawo embi” cishe luzonikeza ikheli lenkampani yasendaweni.
Isifundo ngokuvamile sizohlanganisa zonke izindaba okuxoxwe ngazo lapha ngokujulile, ngokuvamile ngendlela yokukusebenzisa engokoqobo.

Inkambo izohamba ngokujwayelekile kusukela ezinsukwini ezingu-2-5 futhi izobandakanya imidlalo yokulingisa, insiza yezimo eziphuthumayo eningi futhi kwesinye isikhathi ukuqeqeshwa ekusebenziseni izikhali ..
Izincwadi nomagazini abakhuluma ngokuphila endle zivamile, kodwa izincwadi ezikhuluma ngezindawo zezimpi zimbalwa.
Nabani na oceba ukundwendwela ilizwe eliyindawo yemfazwe umele afumane uqeqesho olululo.
Ukukhangela kwi-intanethi usithi 'Hostile environment course' kungenzeka kuvelise idilesi yenkampani yasekuhlaleni.
Into eza kufundiswa ngokuqhelekileyo inaba kuzo zonke izinto esithethe ngazo apha, ize ibe nemizekelo ephilayo.
Ikhosi idla ngokuba ziintsuku eziyi-2 ukuya kweziyi-5, yaye iza kuquka ukudlala indima, unyango loncedo lokuqala yaye ngamanye amaxesha uqeqesho lokusebenzisa izixhobo.
Iincwadi neemagazini ezithetha ngokuphila kwiindawo ezisentlango ziqhelekile, kodwa iimpapasho ezithetha ngeendawo ezinemfazwe zimbalwa.

IYurophu izwekali elincane ngokwesilinganiso kodwa elinamazwe amaningi azimele. Ngaphansi kwezimo ezivamile, ukuthatha uhambo emazweni amaningana kungasho ukubhalisela i-visa kanye nokudlula lapho kuhlolwa khona amaphasiphoti kaningana.
Indawo yaseSchengen, nokho, isebenza ngandlelathile njengezwe elilodwa kulokhu.
Uma nje uhlala kulendawo, ngokuvamile ungeqa imingcele ngaphandle kokuba kuhlolwe iphasiphothi yakho futhi.
Ngokufanayo, ngokuba ne-visa ye-Schengen, awudingi ukubhalisela i-visa yezwe ngalinye ngokuhlukile kulawo angamalungu e-Shengen, okonga isikhathi, imali kanye nomsebenzi wokugcwalisa amafomu.

IYurophu yikhontinenti encinane kona kodwa inamazwe amaninzi azimeleyo. Phansti kweemeko eziqhelekileyo, ukukhenketha kumazwe amaninzi kungathetha ukuba usoloko uaplayela ivisa nepasi amatyeli amanizi.
I-Schengen zone, nangona, isebenza ngokungathi oku kwe lizwe elinye.
Ukuba uhlala kule ndawo, uza kudlula kwimida ngaphandle kokuba ugqithe kwiindawo ezihlola iipasipothi kwakhona.
Ngokufanyo, xa uneSchengen visa, akuyomfuneko ukuba ufake izicelo zevisa zamazwe ahlukahlukeneyo akwiSchengen, loo nto ikongela ixesha, imali nokugcwalisa amaphepha.
Kweminye imikhosi, iningi lababakhona emkhosini womculo linquma ukukanisa kuleyo ndawo, futhi ababakhona abaningi bakubona kuyingxenye edingekayo yokuhlanganyela.
Uma ufuna ukubona okwenzekayo useduze kuzomelwe ufike masinya ukuze uthole indawo yokukamisa eduze nomculo.
Khumbula ukuthi nakuba umculo osesiteji esiyinhloko ungaphela, kungaba nezingxenye zomkhosi ezizoqhubeka zidlala umculo kuze kube sebusuku kakhulu.
Eminye imikhosi inezindawo zokukanisa ezikhethekile zemindeni enezingane ezincane.

Kwezinye iifestivali, uninzi lwabaya kwiifestivali zomculo baye bagqibe ngokukhempisha kwindawo eza kuba kuyo ifestivali, kwaye abantu abaninzi abaya kuyo bayijonga njengenxalenye ebalulekileyo yamava abo.
Ukuba ufuna ukuba kufutshane nomfutho kuza kufuneka ukuba ufike kwangoko ufumane indawo yokukhempisha ekufutshane nomculo.
Ukhumbule ukuba nangona umculo odlalwa kwiqonga eliyintloko kusenokwenzeka uphelile, kusenokubakho amacandelo efestivali aza kuqhubeka edlala umculo de ubusuku buhambele phambili.
Ezinye iifestivali siba nendawo zokukhempisha ezilungiselelwe amakhaya nabantwana.
Isiqhingi saseHong Kong sinika indawo yaseHong Kong igama layo futhi yindawo leyo izivakashi eziningi eziyithatha njengendawo yokuvakashelwa eyinhloko.
Ipharedi yamabhilidi enza umugqa wesibhakabhaka sase-Hong Kong ifaniswe neshadi lebha elikhazimulayo elibonakala ngokuba khona kwamanzi ase-Victoria Harbour.
Ukuze ube nemibono emihle kakhulu ye-Hong Kong, shiya lesi siqhingi uye echibini lamanzi lase-Kowloon eliqondene.
Iningi kokuthuthuka kwase-Hong Kong Island kugcwele ezweni elisanda kubuyiswa futhi ogwini olusenyakatho.
Le indawo abenzi bamakoloni baseBrithani abayithatha njengendawo yabo ngakho uma ufuna ukubona ubufakazi besikhathi esedlule sobukoloni salendawo, lena indawo efanele ongaqala kuyo.
Isiqithi saseHong Kong sinika intsimi yaseHong Kong igama laso kwaye yeyona ndawo kuthathwa njengabakhenkethi abaninzi njengeyona nto kugxilwe kuyo.
Inqwaba yezakhiwo ezenza i-skyline ye-Hong Kong ithelekiswa ne-bar chart emenyezelayo nevezwa bubukho bamanzi be-Victoria Harbour.
Ukuze uyibone kakhuhle i-Hong Kong, sishiye isiqithi uze uye eKowloon waterfront ephambi kwayo.
Uninzi lophuculo lwedolophu yeSiqithi saseHong Kong lwenziwe phezu komhlaba owawukade ulilwandle lwasemantla.
Le yindawo yabakholoniyali base-Bhritane abayithathayo kwaye ke ukuba ufuna ubungqina bendawo eyadlulayo yommandla, le yindawo elungileyo ukuqala.
Ayikho neze incazelo ekhona yokuthi lemikhiqizo eyenziwe kwabe kungeyakudala. Izinhlangano zentela zichaza izinto esezidlulelwe yiminyaka engu-100 njengama gugu.
Incazelo inokwehluka kwendawo, lapho isilinganiso sobudala singaba sifishane ezindaweni ezinjengaseNyakatho Melika kunaseYurophu.
Imikhiqizo yezandla ingahle ichazwe njengezinto zakudala, nakuba imincane kunempahla efanaya ekhiqizwa ngobuningi.
Ayikho ingcaciso eyamkelwa emhlabeni wonke echaza ukuba ziintoni izinto zakudala. Ezinye iiarhente zerhafu zithi izinto ezingaphezu kweminyaka eyi-100 zizinto zakudala.
Ingcaciso iyahluka ngokweendawo apho umlinganiselo wobudala usenokubamfutshane kwiindawo ezifana naseMntla Merika kunaseYurophu.
Iimveliso ezenziwe ngesandla kungathiwa zizinto zakudala, nangona zisenokuba zintsha kunezinye izinto ezifanayo eziveliswa zininzi.
Kanjalo, ipenseli yaba umngane wabantu abaningi omuhle uma ivela.
Ngokudabukisayo, njengoba izindlela zokubhala ezintsha zivelile, ipenseli inikwe isimo nomsebenzi ophansana.
Abantu manje babhala imilayezo ezikrinini zamakhompyutha, bangasadingi ukusondela emshinini wokucija amapensela.
Umuntu angazibuza ukuthi kuzokwenzekani ngekhibhodi lapho kufika okuthile okusha.
Ngoko, ipensile yaba ngoyena mhlobo kubantu abaninzi mhlana yabakho.
Okulusizi kukuba, njengoko iindlela zokubhala zintsha ziye zavela, ipensile iye yehliselwa kwisikhundla esincinci kunye nokusetyenziswa.
Abantu ngoku babhala imiyalezo kwizikrini zekhompyuter, kungaze kuze kusondele kwisiloli.
Umntu unokuzibuza ukuba iya kuba yintoni na ikhibhodi xa kuza kubakho into entsha.
Ucwaningo lwangekhulu lamashumi amabili leminyaka libonise ukuthi kunezigaba ezimbili zokuhluka: okufihliwe nokuveziwe.
Ukuguquka kwenza ukwahluka kwezakhi zofuzo okusha, futhi ukukhetha kuzisusa emehlukweni oveziwe.
Ukwehluka kokuhlukaniswa nokuhlanganiswa kwehla kwenyuke phakathi kwezigaba ezimbli ngesizukulwane ngasinye.
Uphando lwenkulungwane yamashumi amabini lubonakalisile ukuba zibini iipokotho zokwahluka kwemfuzo: ezifihliweyo kunye nezivakalisiweyo.
Ukutshintsha kofuzo kongeza ufuzo olwahlukahlukeneyo,ibe ukukhetha kuyikhupha kwipuli yezahlukahlukeneyo ezibonisiweyo.
Ulwahlulo nendibaniselwano kuhlukuhla indidi ndidi ukuya emva naphambili phakathi kweepuli esohlulelana ngobudala.
